content.query:
--select sum(convert(numeric(18,2),NETWR)) as NETWR,
--sum(convert(numeric(18,2),KWMENG)) as KWMENG
--from cleansing_data.sap_vbap where VBELN = '0001289876'

--select sum(convert(numeric(18,2),KWERT)) as KWERT,
--sum(convert(numeric(18,2),KAWRT))  as KAWRT
--from cleansing_data.sap_konv
--where KSTAT is null  and KSCHL in('ZCMI','ICMI','ZNFC')
--and  VBELN = '0001289876'


;with vbak_vbap_cte as
(
select 
concat(vbak.KNUMV,vbap.POSNR) as pk_vbak_vbap
,vbap.VBELN	
,vbap.POSNR	  
,vbap.MATNR	
,vbap.PSTYV	
,vbap.UMZIZ	
,vbap.UMZIN	
,vbap.NETWR	
,vbap.KWMENG	
,vbap.VRKME	
,vbap.WERKS
,vbak.ERDAT	
,vbak.ERNAM	
,vbak.AUDAT	
,vbak.VBTYP	
,vbak.AUART	
,vbak.VKORG	
,vbak.VTWEG	
,vbak.SPART	
,vbak.VKGRP	
,vbak.VKBUR	
,vbak.KNUMV	
,vbak.VDATU	
,vbak.BSARK	
,vbak.KUNNR	
,vbak.AEDAT	
,vbak.KVGR3	
,vbak.BUKRS_VF
from cleansing_data.sap_vbap as vbap   
left join cleansing_data.sap_vbak as vbak on vbap.VBELN = vbak.VBELN
where vbap.VBELN	='0001260624'
) 
,konv_cte 
as
(
 	select 
	concat(KNUMV,KPOSN) as pk_konv_cte
	,KNUMV	
	,KPOSN	
	,STUNR	
	,ZAEHK	
	,KSCHL	
	,KWERT	
	,KAWRT	
	,KBETR	
	,KSTAT	
	,KDATU	
	,VBELN	
	from cleansing_data.sap_konv
	where KSTAT is null  and KSCHL in('ZCMI','ICMI','ZNFC')
	and VBELN	='0001260624'
)

select 
--vbak_vbap_cte.VBELN	
--vbak_vbap_cte.POSNR	  
--,vbak_vbap_cte.MATNR	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.PSTYV	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.UMZIZ	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.UMZIN	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.NETWR	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.KWMENG	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.VRKME	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.WERKS
--,vbak_vbap_cte.ERDAT	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.ERNAM	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.AUDAT	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.VBTYP	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.AUART	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.VKORG	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.VTWEG	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.SPART	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.VKGRP	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.VKBUR	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.KNUMV	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.VDATU	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.BSARK	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.KUNNR	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.AEDAT	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.KVGR3	
--,vbak_vbap_cte.BUKRS_VF
--,konv_cte.KPOSN	
--,konv_cte.STUNR	
--,konv_cte.ZAEHK	
--,konv_cte.KSCHL	
--,konv_cte.KWERT	
--,konv_cte.KAWRT	
--,konv_cte.KBETR	
--,konv_cte.KSTAT	
--,konv_cte.KDATU	
vbak_vbap_cte.VBELN
,vbak_vbap_cte.POSNR	  
,vbak_vbap_cte.MATNR
,sum(convert(numeric(18,2),vbak_vbap_cte.NETWR)) as NETWR
,sum(convert(numeric(18,2),vbak_vbap_cte.KWMENG)) as KWMENG
,sum(convert(numeric(18,2),konv_cte.KWERT)) as KWERT
,sum(convert(numeric(18,2),konv_cte.KAWRT)) as KAWRT
from vbak_vbap_cte inner join konv_cte on 
vbak_vbap_cte.pk_vbak_vbap = konv_cte.pk_konv_cte
group by  vbak_vbap_cte.VBELN,vbak_vbap_cte.POSNR	  
,vbak_vbap_cte.MATNR
